snippet: While guns top the list of weapons used in violent assaults, every so often, a crime is committed with a weapon that harks back to a different era.
abstract: Ice pick, a favorite weapon of gangsters decades ago, is occasionally a modern weapon of choice in New York City; common household tool is a lethal, but legal, item that is easy to obtain, and faces no laws against its possession; City Councilman Peter F Vallone Jr has drawn up a bill that would ban the sale of ice picks in the city to anyone under 21.
lead_paragraph: While guns top the list of weapons used in violent assaults, every so often, a crime is committed with a weapon that harks back to a different era.

headline.seo: Ice Picks Are Still Used as Weapons
headline.main: The Ice Pick Seems Antiquated, but It Still Shows Up on the Police Blotter
headline.print_headline: The Ice Pick Seems Antiquated, But It Still Shows Up Occasionally On the Police Blotter
